descriptionHtml:
Dynaheir from Baldur's Gate, now in Skyrim! I made her because I wanted my favorite party members to follow me around Tamriel. She's a Destruction mage with all 3 elements at her disposal, as well as a few healing spells. If she runs out of magicka she will fall back until it recharges, then jump back in.

Levels with the player (up to 81), shouldn't set off traps, and sneak is one of her skills. She's marriable, essential, and AFT compatible. You can find her hanging out at the Frozen Hearth in in Winterhold. She should be compatible with other follower mods, let me know if there's any issues.

I'll get more screenshots up as I can.

I also have Imoen and Minsc, and plan on making other BG party members as I find the time.
Minsc: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52174/?
Imoen: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52182/?

Let me know if you have any suggestions or issues!
author: RangerRogue
